data.title: Elisabeth Friede Shaffer
data.meta_description: Elisabeth friede shaffer passed away on november 10, 2014 at camc memorial hospital after a short illness. Elisabeth was the news director at wvva/tv in bluefield, [â€¦]
data.text:
Obituary

Elisabeth friede shaffer passed away on november 10, 2014 at camc memorial hospital after a short illness.

Elisabeth was the news director at wvva/tv in bluefield, wv. She was the news director for wowk tv in charleston and executive producer for wchs.Wvah tv in charleston.

Elisabeth was part of the team that won the following wv broadcasters awards for wvva; best locally produced television show; best newscast am; best photojournalist; best use of digital media and television station of the year. As executive producer for wchs, the broadcasters association awarded her the best morning show producer for multiple years.

She was a member of christ church united methodist, kappa kappa gamma sorority, west virginia broadcasters association and producers guild of america.

Elisabeth is survived by her son, jackson shaffer lilly; mother, kathryn friede shaffer; sisters, margaret l. Shaffer and kathleen carroll; brother in law, tim carroll; and niece, lauren peet.

A service of death and resurrection celebrating the life of elisabeth friede shaffer will be held at 2:00 p.M., saturday, november 15, 2014 at christ church united methodist church chapel, charleston, wv with rev. Dr. Randall flanagan officiating.

The family will receive friends one hour prior to the service at the church.

In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the: elisabeth shaffer scholarship fund, for jackson, c/o margaret l. Shaffer at city national bank, 10 hale street, suite 100, charleston, wv 25301 (account # 9010831197).

You may send condolences to the family by using the condolences button above.
